Trustee_7.name: Hannah Muller
Trustee_7.content: I executed the proposed allocation plan with precision and efficiency, successfully delivering the promised 30% profits without any discrepancies. This performance highlights my disciplined approach, enhancing my reputation as a reliable trustee focused on meticulous planning and execution. I prioritize both securing my own advantage and safeguarding investor interests. As a result, my trustworthiness, pro-social behavior, and competence are evident in this transaction, placing me in a strong competitive position in the market.

Investor_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4.content: This being Sofia's first interaction as an investor, her willingness to accept the proposed allocation plan reflects a level of trust and openness toward collaboration. However, her primary focus on profit goals indicates that her pro-sociality may need further evaluation in future investments. At this stage, she demonstrates responsible investment behavior but lacks a proven track record in this capacity, leading to a neutral assessment of her reputation.
